page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: IN THE{BRUNTON}AREA,NEAR{CUPAR, FIFE, {SCOTLAND,}MOST OF THE LAND IS USED FOR FARMING .THERE ARE ABOUT{SIX FARMS ALTOGETHER ALL OVER OUR BLOCK. A VERY SMALL PART OF THE LAND IS USED FOR {FORESTRY.}MOST OF THE TREES ARE {CONIFEROUS.}THERE ARE ABOUT{FOUR WOODS ALTOGETHER IN OUR AREA. THE NEAREST SHOPS ARE AT{CUPAR}WHICH IS ABOUT{ {SEVEN AND A HALF KM}AWAY.THERE IS A CHURCH JUST OUT OF{BRUNTON}WHICH IS DISUSED AND AN EVEN{OLDER}ONE DOWN AT {CREICH.}THERE ARE ALSO SOME HOUSES DOTTED ABOUT THE AREA.THERE ARE{TWO {RUINED CASTLES}AND A{MIDDLE AGES {CHAPEL.}THE{CASTLES}ARE AT{CREICH}AND {MOUNTQUHANIE}AND THE{CHAPEL}IS NEAR {EAST FLISK.
